question_content: Does the game contain any sensitive content (Sexual Content/Nudity, Violence/Gore, Drugs/Alcohol/Tobacco, Religious/Political)? (If not mentioned, answer “N/A”)
List the sensitive content mentioned, if any.
synthesis_answer:
- Religious/Political: Warns UGC could enable political displays, risking Chinese censorship. [46445892]
- Urges preventive measures to avoid "Animal Crossing's domestic ban." [46445892]

question_content: Summarize the core combat mechanics (or “N/A” if not mentioned).
synthesis_answer:
- Trailer combat animations feel rigid; players want smoother, Genshin/ZZZ-level fluidity — "actions look stiff." [46438126]
- Don’t force combat in casual farming/building modes; keep fights optional. [46442268]
- Reduce gear/stat grind (e.g., artifact farming); build optimization feels exhausting. [46442268]

question_content: Rate combat satisfaction: -2 (very negative) to 2 (very positive) or “N/A”
Reason for previous question’s rating
synthesis_answer:
• Trailer looks promising, but combat animations feel slightly stiff; needs Genshin/ZZZ-level smoothness. [46438126]
• Requests animation optimization to improve combat satisfaction and fluidity. [46438126]

Does the game have a gacha guarantee system? (True/False/“N/A”)
Briefly describe the gacha guarantee system if answer to previous question is True, else answer “N/A”
synthesis_answer:
- Races and planets are obtained via gacha; each race has a matching planet. [46440497]
- At 90 pulls, 50% chance for featured race; at 180 pulls, guaranteed. [46440497]
- Planets follow the same 90-pull 50% and 180-pull guarantee structure. [46440497]
- Gacha pity: "90 pulls: 50%; 180 pulls: guaranteed." [46440497]

question_content: Rate reasonableness of gacha pull price: -2 to 2 or “N/A”
Reason for previous question’s rating
Rate major feature access for non-paying users: -2 to 2 or “N/A”
Reason for previous question’s rating
Rate spending pressure: -2 (heavy/annoying) to 2 (elegant/subtle), or “N/A”
Reason for previous question’s rating
synthesis_answer:
- Many players want a buy-to-play model, not gacha monetization. "No more gacha, please." [46447064, 46442265]
- Strong skepticism the game will reuse miHoYo "three-piece" gacha monetization. [46446841, 46441656]
- Some preemptively threaten low ratings if gacha systems return. [46446841]
- Expectation of monetized furniture/skins and resource boosts driving spending pressure. [46446155]
- Sarcastic predictions of gacha for races/planets with pity systems. [46440497]
- Concern it will be heavily pay-driven with frequent events and grind/pay pressure. [46440692]
- Past bad gacha experiences cited: pity hits, off-banner pulls feel punishing. [46442581]
- Anxiety about future spend levels in long-term social/management game. [46449005, 46447064]
- Some ask for no miHoYo suite and praise if avoided. [46447064, 46446841]
- Players wonder if characters will be gacha again. [46439954]
